results.title: Thousands of Boko Haram Members Surrendered. They Moved In Next Door.
results.abstract: Fighters and family members of a terrorist group in Nigeria have defected in droves since the death of their leader. They’ve been relocated to a city they once terrorized.

results.title: Navalny to the Russian Opposition: ‘Be Discouraged, a Little Bit’
results.abstract: Emblematic of the beleaguered state of the opposition, a forlorn group of volunteers maintains a 24-hour vigil at the spot where a prominent democracy advocate was killed in 2015.

results.title: Biden Declared the War Over. But Wars Go On.

results.title: France, Striving for Global Power, Still Struggles to Get It
results.abstract: Though often seen as vanity or pique, France’s assertiveness abroad is calibrated to manage a quandary it has faced since World War II: how to act as an independent power while depending on allies.
des_facet: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
